parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: Network address or host name of the Becker CentralControl.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Network port of the Becker CentralControl.

parameter.name: connectionTimeout
parameter.label: Connection timeout
parameter.description: Time before connection attempts are aborted (seconds, 1-3600).

parameter.name: requestTimeout
parameter.label: Request timeout
parameter.description: Time before pending requests are aborted (seconds, 1-3600).

parameter.name: idleTimeout
parameter.label: Idle timeout
parameter.description: Time of inactivity before connections are closed (seconds, 1-3600).
